alert.note: Alert for Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 1:21PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laurens and southern Spartanburg Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Laurens, or 6 miles east of Ware Shoals, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Clinton, Waterloo, Ware Shoals, Ora, Cross Anchor and Mountville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
